name: colon
description: `npm run :` for interactive script picker with auto-folders for scripts with ":"

scripts.dev:project-a: echo "Starting dev server for project-a..." && exit 1
scripts.dev:project-b: echo "Starting dev server for project-b..." && exit 1
scripts.build:web:prod:minify: echo "Building web production with minification..." && exit 1
scripts.build:web:dev:watch: echo "Building web dev with watch mode..." && exit 1
scripts.test:unit:frontend:coverage: echo "Running frontend unit tests with coverage..." && exit 1
scripts.test:unit:backend:watch: echo "Running backend unit tests in watch mode..." && exit 1
scripts.deploy:staging:web:cdn: echo "Deploying web to staging CDN..." && exit 1
scripts.setup:test: rm -rf node_modules/colon && mkdir -p node_modules/colon && rsync -av --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='.git' . node_modules/colon/ && cd node_modules/colon && npm install --no-save && cd ../.. && mkdir -p node_modules/.bin && ln -sf ../colon/cli.js node_modules/.bin/colon
